name: azure-justrun
description: Provides some simple components to run azure apps

azure-justrun:index:PublicAccess.description: Specifies whether data in the container may be accessed publicly and the level of access.

azure-justrun:index:SkuName.description: The SKU name. Required for account creation; optional for update. Note that in older versions, SKU name was called accountType.

azure-justrun:index:containerapp.description: This represents a container app component resource

url.description: The URL of the container app

dockerImageName.description: The name of the docker image. One will be created if not provided

imageDirectory.description: The name of the directory where the docker image to be created is. NOT the actual directory, i.e. 'nodeapp' instead of './nodeapp'

namePrefix.description: The name prefix given to child resources of this component. Should not contain dashes.

registryName.description: The name of the image registry. One will be created if not provided

resourceGroupName.description: The resource group to use. One will be created if not provided.

storageAccountName.description: The name of the storage account to use. One will be created if not provided.

version.description: The version of the created docker image

azure-justrun:index:webapp.description: This represents a web app component resource

url.description: The URL of the web app

appSkuName.description: The tier of the compute instance running the server. Also see appSkuName

appSkuTier.description: The name of the compute instance running the server. Also see appSkuTier

containerPublicAccess.description: The public access level of the BlobContainer containg the website data.

filePath.description: The relative file path to the folder containing web files.

namePrefix.description: The name prefix given to child resources of this component. Should not contain dashes.

resourceGroupName.description: The resource group to use. One will be created if not provided.

storageAccountName.description: The name of the storage account to use. One will be created if not provided.

storageSkuName.description: The SKU name of the storage account created, if storageAccount is not provided
